title: Simply stunning! Luxurious 3 Bed / 1 Bath in Stamford!
posting_body: ['Come home to a great community - Residences on Bedford!', 'Address:', '1425 Bedford St', 'Stamford, CT 06905', 'Beds:', '3  /', 'Baths:', '1 /', 'Size:', '1128 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', '$2639 - $2835', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', "With renovated apartments, luxury amenities, and a location that can't be beat, The Residences on Bedford is the best way to find your dream apartment.", 'Call us to schedule a tour to view one of our 1 or 2 bedroom apartments or apply online today to find your new dream home.', "We can't wait to hear from you and we look forward in helping you make The Residences on Bedford your new home!", 'Security Deposit:', '$1250', 'Length of Lease:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month, 17-Month, 18-Month', '(203) 208-3262', 'Property Features:', '● 24 Hour Convenience Store', '● Bowling Alley', '● Business Center', '● Clubhouse', '● Fitness Center', '● Gas Grills', '● On-Site Park', '● Parks Nearby', '● Pet Friendly', '● Pool', '● 48-Hour Maintenance Commitment', '● Beautiful Picnic Areas', '● Close to Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment', '● Elegant Clubroom', '● Free Wi-Fi access in Common Areas', '● Ice Skating Rink **Winter Only', '● Laundry Facilities on Every Floor', '● Near Downtown Stamford', '● Online Payments Available', 'Apartment Amenities:', '● Abundant Closet Space', '● Air Conditioning', '● All Units Come With Brand New Hardwood Floors!', '● Balcony', '● Black Appliances', '● Blinds', '● Garage', '● Gas Ranges', '● Large, Private Balconies', '● Updated Interior Finishes', 'Pets:', 'We charge a $500 non-refundable fee for each pet.', 'We also charge $75 for pet rent for each pet monthly.', 'Pet Types: Cats and Dogs', 'Breed restrictions apply', 'Weight Limit: 35 lbs.', 'Maximum pets per unit: 2', 'Business Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Ready to Lease?', 'Call our office at (203) 208-3262', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Proudly managed by JRK Property Holdings', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '8E5BBE37CCEE40']
